name: Marketicious

overview:
Toronto based Integrated Marketing & Brand Management firm.

Marketicious is a Toronto based Integrated Marketing company specializing in reaching your target customer. As a focused organization, we specialise in

  • Integrated Marketing Communications
  • Public Relations
  • Communications
  • Event Management
  • Ethnic Marketing
  • Web Marketing
  • Print Marketing
  • Broadcast Media Marketing
